required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: To Compare the PK and Safety of Omalizumab(CT-P39, EU-approved Xolair, and US-licensed Xolair) in Healthy Subjects
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 1, Randomized, Double-blind, Three-arm, Parallel Group, Single-dose Study to Compare the Pharmacokinetics and Safety of Three Formulations of Omalizumab (CT-P39, EU-approved Xolair, and US-licensed Xolair) in Healthy Subjects

brief_summary.textblock: A Phase 1, Randomized, Double-blind, Three-arm, Parallel Group, Single-dose Study to Compare the Pharmacokinetics and Safety of Three Formulations of Omalizumab (CT-P39, EU-approved Xolair, and US-licensed Xolair) in Healthy Subjects

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.description: Treatment-Emergent Adverse Events (TEAEs) of CT-P39, compared to that of EU-approved Xolair in healthy subjects

Area Under the concentration-time Curve from time zero to infinity (AUC0-inf) of CT-P39, EU approved Xolair, and US-licensed Xolair in healthy subjects (CT-P39 to EU approved Xolair, CT-P39 to US licensed Xolair, and EU-approved Xolair to US licensed Xolair)

Area Under the concentration-time Curve from time zero to the last quantifiable concentration (AUC0-last) of CT-P39, EU approved Xolair, and US-licensed Xolair in healthy subjects (CT-P39 to EU approved Xolair, CT-P39 to US licensed Xolair, and EU-approved Xolair to US licensed Xolair)

Maximum serum concentration (Cmax) of CT-P39, EU approved Xolair, and US-licensed Xolair in healthy subjects (CT-P39 to EU approved Xolair, CT-P39 to US licensed Xolair, and EU-approved Xolair to US licensed Xolair)

secondary_outcome.description: To assess Time to Cmax (Tmax) of CT-P39, EU-approved Xolair, and US-licensed Xolair in healthy subjects
To assess Terminal half-life (t1/2) of CT-P39, EU-approved Xolair, and US-licensed Xolair in healthy subjects
To assess Percentage of AUC0-inf obtained by extrapolation (%AUCext) of CT-P39, EU-approved Xolair, and US-licensed Xolair in healthy subjects
To assess Terminal elimination rate constant (λz) of CT-P39, EU-approved Xolair, and US-licensed Xolair in healthy subjects

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetic Outcome Measures [Apparent total body clearance (CL/F)]
secondary_outcome.description: To assess Apparent total body clearance (CL/F) of CT-P39, EU-approved Xolair, and US-licensed Xolair in healthy subjects
To assess Mean residence time (MRT) of CT-P39, EU-approved Xolair, and US-licensed Xolair in healthy subjects
Free IgE and total IgE levels (the sum of free and omalizumab-bound IgE) in the serum samples from subjects

secondary_outcome.measure: Incidence of Adverse events of Special Interest [Safety]
secondary_outcome.description: Adverse events of Special Interest (AESI) of CT-P39, EU approved Xolair, and US-licensed Xolair in healthy subjects (e.g., Allergic reactions type 1/anaphylaxis, injection site reactions, serum sickness/serum sickness-like reactions, and parasitic infections)

arm_group.description: 150 mg/mL, Solution for injection in PFS
150 mg/mL, Solution for injection in PFS
150 mg/mL, Solution for injection in PFS
150 mg/mL, Solution for injection in PFS
150 mg/mL, Solution for injection in PFS

intervention.description: 150 mg/mL, Solution for injection in PFS
150 mg/mL, Solution for injection in PFS
150 mg/mL, Solution for injection in PFS
150 mg/mL, Solution for injection in PFS
150 mg/mL, Solution for injection in PFS

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Healthy subject (male or female) between the ages of 18 and 55 years.
- Subject with a body weight of > 40 kg and ≤ 90 kg and a BMI between 18.0 kg/m2 and 29.9 kg/m2(both inclusive).
- Subject with an IgE level of ≤ 100 IU/mL.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Subject has a medical history and/or current presence of disease including one or more of the allergic reaction.
